page.title: 10SURVEY ON LEISURE TIME USE
page.content: 170 PEOPLE WERE INTERVIEWED. IN ONE MONTH,THERE WERE: 137 VISITS TO THE CINEMA,581 VISITS TO THE PUB,82 VISITS TO A RESTAURANT. IN ONE MONTH,464 GAMES(CARS AND BOARD GAMES)WERE PLAYED AND 825 ELECTRONIC GAMES/COMPUTERS WERE USED. 116 PEOPLE DID SOME KIND OF SPORT. 136 HAD ACCESS TO A TENNIS COURT. 119 HAD ACCESS TO A SWIMMING POOL. 92 BELONGED TO AN ASSOCIATION/CLUB. 85 USED THEIR LOCAL CENTRE/VILLAGE HALL. 56 RENTED VIDEOS FROM A SHOP. 120 HAD ADEQUATE TRANSPORT. 169 HAD A TELEVISION. 475 HOURS OF T.V. PER DAY WERE WATCHED.OTHER POPULAR ACTIVITIES:HORSE-RIDING;JOGGING;WALKIN G;WATER-SPORTS;GARDENING;CRAFT-WORK;DI SCOS AND PARTIES.
